docs.snippet: The return of the Moore-McCormack Lines' "Good Neighbor Fleet" to regular peacetime passenger service between New York and East Coast ports of South America is being eagerly awaited by the travel-hungry of both continents, a spokesman for the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The return of the Moore-McCormack Lines' "Good Neighbor Fleet" to regular peacetime passenger service between New York and East Coast ports of South America is being eagerly awaited by the travel-hungry of both continents, a spokesman for the steamship company said yesterday.

headline.main: STRIKE MAY DELAY DEBUT OF 3 LINERS; ' Good Neighbor Fleet' Slated to Resume Pessenger Trips to South America Soon

docs.snippet: Week Ended June 27, 1947 The foreign exchange market during the past week was quiet and lacked any special movement. Amount of business transacted was routine and price fluctuation was confined to a fairly narrow range. Canadian free dollar rallied...
docs.lead_paragraph: Week Ended June 27, 1947 The foreign exchange market during the past week was quiet and lacked any special movement. Amount of business transacted was routine and price fluctuation was confined to a fairly narrow range. Canadian free dollar rallied fractionally over the previous week while sterling futures eased in midweek and then held steady. Swiss franc was lower.

docs.snippet: URUGUAY: 60 unions start 24-hr strike to protest new Govt law banning strikes, Montevideo

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 1 -- Although tobaccos, oils, films, motors, transport and newspaper shares were marked down following the announcement by Chancellor of the Exchequer Hugh Dalton of import cuts, jobbers found selling light in stock markets here today.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 1 -- Although tobaccos, oils, films, motors, transport and newspaper shares were marked down following the announcement by Chancellor of the Exchequer Hugh Dalton of import cuts, jobbers found selling light in stock markets here today.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; Some Groups React to Announcement of Import Cuts, but Offerings Are Light

docs.snippet: COLLECTORS await an announcement by the Postoffice Department regarding a stamp which President Truman has directed be issued, commemorating the sesquicentennial of the launching of "Old Ironsides," otherwise the U.S.S. Constitution, which maritime...
docs.lead_paragraph: COLLECTORS await an announcement by the Postoffice Department regarding a stamp which President Truman has directed be issued, commemorating the sesquicentennial of the launching of "Old Ironsides," otherwise the U.S.S. Constitution, which maritime authorities have called "one of the most famous ships in the annals of the American Navy."

headline.main: NEWS OF THE WORLD OF STAMPS; A New Issue Expected To Commemorate the Ship Constitution

docs.snippet: JERUSALEM, July 5 -- Four members of the United Nations Special Committee on Palestine made the committee's longest and most cordial contact with Palestine Arabs when they informally visited the Arab College, Government teacher-training institution...
docs.lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM, July 5 -- Four members of the United Nations Special Committee on Palestine made the committee's longest and most cordial contact with Palestine Arabs when they informally visited the Arab College, Government teacher-training institution in Jerusalem, today.
